title: This is the proof That Rengar Is a bit Overestimated
body:
http://euw.op.gg/champion/rengar/statistics/jungle
This is statistical, not flame without argument

On top of his high ban rate, his winrate the first week after rework is 46% in EUW and 44% in NA. It's a bit early to base his general power  on these data but it's a bit early to call him broken too or ask for a nerf, without proper compensations.

the same reasoning should be applied to other rework.

I know playing against this rengar is frustating and way too snowball, but  I'm sure Riot will find a way to balance him in 1-3 patches, maybe even giving him an higher skill base. 
I'm the first one who doesn't  love this rework, but I don't think all these 'trash-post' about how broken Rengar is now, will help riot's team to find a way to balance him.

So Remember: always argued and make suggestions
Let's be productive!

replies.body:
He is the largest feast or famine champ every conceived.  There is literally a 30% difference in the amount of ad he gets (nvm the 7.5% increased overall dmg) based on if he is a good rengar or not.

I'd imagine once people really start to get the hang of him and anyone with above 50-125 games his winrate is going to go up give it another week of practice.  Then we should look at statistics again.
Actually he is more like feast or feast lul
There's already a number of players that simply dominate on him. I was watching Meteos the other day and every Rengar game was a complete slaughter. So in the right hands he's completely busted.

Exactly. A killing machine with nowhere as much fun to play as before. 

This is a thread I started on this theme. Read it and bump it if you feel the same:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/whrnbXdE-the-boring-cat-fiasco-rengar-mains-unite
His winrate is bad because everyone is spamming him (which is a lot of ppl that DONT KNOW how to play rengar), hes broken.

> [{quoted}](name=RexSaur,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3Q5JgpGm,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-11-14T00:55:39.345+0000)
>
> His winrate is bad because everyone is spamming him (which is a lot of ppl that DONT KNOW how to play rengar), hes broken.

even Kha's pick rate is very high, but he still has 50% win rate. More broken then rengar?

Seen a lot of people bashing about the fact that his Base AD growth is so low.
Like heck, you only need to build 75 bonus AD (and have 5 stacks of your bonetooth necklace) to make up for that difference. 
In my opinion, he is actually quite broken in the right situation, while being balanced at the same time.
His Q damage and cooldown (especially the cooldown) give him the possibility to actually deal a lot of AoE damage (which he couldn't before).

The problem most people probably have, is that the new Rengar has a different playstyle. I like this playstyle a lot more than the previous one, but I don't like the new LeBlanc for example. People have to get used to it.

Wondering, what do you like more about his playstyle?
In my opinion, they turned him into a mindless Q-press-instakill machine.
At least, before rework, you had to work your ass to pull out a lot of tricks.

I got insane scores like in the range of triple-Q Rengar era, but all the fun is gone.

You are not the only one, bro. Almost all Rengar mains I know agree with this statement.
Rengar is a lot easier to play now, burst harder than before while the whole experience feels  less rewarding and flimsy.
He is now hated both by his oppenents and by the vast majority of main Rengar players.
We need to unite and somehow determine RIOT to actually come with a rework that honor both the actual Rengar players and his opponents.

This is a thread I started on this theme. Read it and bump it if you feel the same:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/whrnbXdE-the-boring-cat-fiasco-rengar-mains-unite
He just feels really.....bleh. The ferocity drop off really hurt him. It makes ganking with your ult really hit or miss are you dont have solid lockdown
If you don't see how a flat 30% bonus to AD is totally busted, there's something wrong with you.
